column3: School of Sport, Exercise and Rehabilitation Sciences
column5: Our innovative Exercise and Sports Medicine (Football) MSc is aimed at physiotherapists and doctors either working within football medicine or interested in moving into football medicine.The programme is aimed at physiotherapists and doctors and is ideal for those either working within football medicine or interested in moving into football medicine.The programme includes two specialist modules, which are partly taught in the tranquil grounds of St George’s Park with input from some of the Football Association’s key sports medicine staff.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
